title: LANE THIEF
body:
Cried our zed as he afked/dced the first 15m of the game and tried to come back mid.

4 people asked him to go bot so he could level up.

He tried to convince the enemy team that i was trolling while everyone else defended me.

7 people reported him at the end. He still tried to report us and called us bad as he fed Fizz.

"Nothing will happen to me i have lolreplay"
